ISSUE.TITLE: gitlab skip_verify don't work
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: i have a problem with gitlab. our server has a self signed certificate. so i set `skip_verify=true` but get this message: `2015/03/18 13:27:33 Error exchanging token. Post https://our.gitlab-server.de/oauth/token: x509: certificate signed by unknown authority` @Bugagazavr said it is a problem with oauth.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: [code-1195]: integrate status check logs in harness mode (#922)
